get.description: Return a list of current subscriptions
Returns a collections of alerts grouped by subscriptions
Returns a collections of alerts for the specified subscriber.
Returns a single alert for the specified subscriber and alert.

patch.description: Updates an existings alert for the specified subscriber and alert

get.description: Returns a collections of actions belonging to the specified subscriber and alert.
Returns a single action for the specified user, alert and action.

put.description: Creates or updates an existing action for the specified user and alert

get.description: Returns a collections of events belonging to the specified subscriber.
Returns a single event for the specified subscriber and event.
Returns a list of action plans for the specified subscriber.
Returns a single action plan for the specified subscriber and action plan Id.

patch.description: Updates an action plan for the specified subscriber and actionPlanId.

post.description: Create a single action for the specified action plan.

patch.description: Update the specified action for the specified action plan.

200.description: Returns the action for that action plan
